solution_line_template: He now runs {times_per_week_before}+{extra_days}=<<{times_per_week_before}+{extra_days}={times_per_week_now}>>{times_per_week_now} times a week
Each day he runs for {hours_morning}+{hours_evening}=<<{hours_morning}+{hours_evening}={hours_per_day}>>{hours_per_day} hours
So he runs {hours_per_day}*{times_per_week_now}=<<{hours_per_day}*{times_per_week_now}={total_hours_per_week}>>{total_hours_per_week} hours a week
